name: Looping Puzzle Game
description:
Create colourful animated loops in this relaxing and easy-to-learn puzzle game. Tap a tile to make it rotate and make sure that all tiles together create a seamless looping animated flow. The sides of each tile should match the looping animation of all neighbouring tiles to achieve a perfect flow. There should be no loose ends. Keep rotating the pieces to connect all the lines, creating a closed shape pattern with a looping animation. Watch the shape come magically alive when all animations connect to each other.

There is no (time) pressure, move limit or score threshold in these puzzle games, just relax and make things looping!

In case you get stuck solving the puzzle, subtle hints are given.

Enjoy fifty levels with an increasing grid size, challenging your patience and perception. Levels are randomly generated each time a new game is started, providing an endless amount of unique puzzles.
